I stand by my choice.

The fact that Gangplank has 2 default skins (Let's be honest, Captain is just a second default). And the fact that the whole Burning Tides event helped Gangplanks character development makes him either my nr. 1 rework or right below Sion.

These 2 are just the best ones IMO.
Gangplank's kit fits his personality SO Well... But Sion is overall just fucking PERFECT!
{{summoner:31}}

Difference is that while Gangplank thematically and lore-wise is extremely good, his kit on release was an absolute mess with high numbers and even quite overloaded. I mean he's fine now for the most part, but I'd definitely say there are other "best" reworked champions simply because of how unbalanced Gangplank's kit was for so long.

GP was extremely broken on release and had been broken of quite a while. 
(God I'm glad He's balanced now, seeing him get nerfed over and over made me really sad.)

But I don't think that makes him a worse rework. For example, Ekko.
Ekko was extremely broken on release? Does that make him a poorly designed champion?
I don't think it does.
_Ekko might've been a bad example because of tank ekko, but k_
{{summoner:31}}

Ekko is a poorly designed champion because he was broken on release and still presents numerous problems like his overloaded kit and him being quite unfun to play against.

It's like saying "this champion has the worst kit in the game and most of his kit is just recycled concepts. but it's not bad because stuff."

Well let's look at it this way; both Taric and Sion went from shoddy to OMG HOLY SOD BNASKJHVBCGHBVASKVCASG

So I feel like they're both great reworks =)
